document_data.name: Alter Reality
document_data.mainbody: '''''Alter reality''''' was an [[arcane magic|arcane]] [[illusion]] [[spell]] that could temporarily make changes in reality that suited the caster.
document_data.Effects: The caster envisioned the change they wanted to happen during the spell's casting. They did this by speaking it aloud and casting a ''[[phantasmal force]]'' version of the change. Typically, only minor changes could be affected without dire consequences. ''Alter reality'' was a double-edged sword, with caster's trying to change too much often seeing the spell backfire upon them.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as a [[material component]] part of the caster's life force as casting this spell aged the caster slightly.
document_data.History: The ''alter reality'' spell could be used to destroy the ''[[rod of mirrors]]''.{{Cite dragon/102/Nine Wands of Wonder|30}}
